item.content:
Overview

This is personal blog power by hugo hosted on github pages

Setup procedure

Follow the steps in Hugo - Quick Start

On MacBook install hugo

brew install hugo

Create a new personal blog site

hugo new site zshen-blog

Choose a theme, and add it as submodule

git submodule add https://github.com/rhazdon/hugo-theme-hello-friend-ng.git themes/hello-friend-ng

Copy the exampleSite files into git repo root folder, remove the existing posts

cp themes/hello-friend-ng/exampleSite/* ./
rm content/posts/*

Create a new post

hugo new posts/my-first-post.md

How to automate?

source code is committed to main branch use GitHub actions to automate the deployment to gh-pages branch

Reference

  • HUGO - Quick Start
  • HUGO - Host on GitHub
  • GitHub - hugo-theme-hello-friend-ng
